Text: until the whole slinky has collapsed.
So in order for one coil to fall,
it needs the coil above it to collapse
and so on all the way up to the top.
It's like a row of dominoes
where the tension released at the top
This is the longest slinky I had access to
and what's cool about this angle
is you can see the bottom starts to rotate
Meaning there is a twisting wave
until the top crashes into it.
